original_title: Playing for Change: Songs Around The World
overview: Playing for Change is a musical journey of discovery that celebrates the freedom and lives of street musicians existing in America today. Focusing on the three cities of Los Angeles, New Orleans & New York, Playing for Change captures an array of musical styles and human moments that would otherwise slip through the cracks of society.  - Jayson Crittenden, Mark Johnson & Jonathan Walls
title: Playing for Change: Songs Around The World
